title: Appendix 12 - Evaluating Fidelity and Utility of Synthetic Health Data
purpose: Guide evaluators on measuring how well synthetic data preserves source patterns and supports intended analytical use.
body: Fidelity focuses on how closely synthetic data reflects the statistical properties and relationships in the source data.
Utility focuses on whether synthetic data supports the analyses, models, and decisions required by the approved use case.
Use this appendix to select evaluation metrics, document thresholds, and report limitations before data sharing.
